definition: career/life (way in which sb lives)/period of one's life
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: He was very open about his inspiration and his plans for his career.
sentences.chinese: 對於他的夢想和職業生涯計劃，韓庚是很公開的。

sentences.english: What changes have you made in the course of your career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的職業生涯中你已經做了什麼改變？

sentences.english: After her acting career, Chen became a billionaire in the advertising business.
sentences.chinese: 結束演藝生涯後，陳曉旭從事廣告業，身價過億。

sentences.english: Hiss election to the presidency climaxed his political career.
sentences.chinese: 他的當選爲總統使他的政治生涯達到最高峯。

sentences.english: During the first year of my teaching career, I always work with full passion and attention.
sentences.chinese: 在年我的教學生涯中，我總是工作，的熱情和關注。

sentences.english: His career has gone from strength to strength ever since and he is now the team's captain and its lynchpin.
sentences.chinese: 生涯已由實力自從和他現在是該隊的隊長及其甚殷。

sentences.english: She never had children because they would have interfered with her dancing career.
sentences.chinese: 她一直沒生孩子，因爲孩子會妨礙她的舞蹈生涯。

sentences.english: He started his official career as a diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 他從當外交官起開始了他的從政生涯。

sentences.english: Has your practice amount changed throughout your dancing career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的舞蹈生涯裏，你練舞的時間表會經常變嗎？

sentences.english: If you aren't working for someone else, then work for yourself - by treating your job search as a full-time endeavor.
sentences.chinese: 長期的失業對職業生涯和資金來說都是件困難的事情。

sentences.english: Leos Carax is aware of the maddening contradiction of his career.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座苔意識到他的職業生涯發瘋的矛盾。

sentences.english: Then, just as you do in your career, follow through.
sentences.chinese: 然後，就像你在職業生涯中所作的，持續跟進。

sentences.english: Farrell's career in law was probably doomed before it began.
sentences.chinese: 法雷爾的法律生涯還沒開始就註定是個悲劇。

sentences.english: Saya will start teaching full-time after passing a trial term at a Tokyo primary school.
sentences.chinese: 如果通過試用期，她將開始她的全職教師生涯。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter for secondary school education career planning of curriculum system construction.
sentences.chinese: 第五章爲中職學校生涯規劃教育課程體系的建構。

definition: variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
summit/apex/pinnacle (of one's career etc)/peak (of a civilization etc)
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
(of a performer) to come onto the stage to perform/(of an athlete) to enter the arena to compete/(fig.) to enter the scene (e.g. a new product)/(of an examinee etc) to leave the venue
